column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////1) CHEF'S SCRAMBLE - if you liked eating the deluxe breakfasts as a kid from McDonalds
column2: this is the healthier/grown up version. This dish includes: three eggs scrambled with daily selection of seasonal ingredients
column4: choice of bacon or sausage patty
column5: choice of biscuits or whole wheat toast with jam.
